30.<left>スイゼン湿原は 豊かな水に育まれた|<left>大自然の宝庫ですが: Suizen Marsh is a treasure trove of nature,|nurtured by rich water and abundance of food,|but also a dangerous area where monsters live.

31.<left>行き止まりでも 見にいかずにはいられない。|<left>あなたは 旅: Even if it's a dead end, you can't help but go|take a look. You are the true reflection|of travelers!

40.<left>この先 行き止まりです。|<left>本当に 行き止まりです。: <left>Dead end ahead.|<left>It's really a dead end.

156.<left>幼き日の ニコロイ王と|<left>家族が描かれた 肖像画だ。|<l: It's a portrait of King Nicolai as a child|with his family.|Everyone was smiling happily.

158.<left>黒板には 高度な呪文に関する 難解な論文が|<left>たくさん貼ら:
The blackboard seems to be filled with arcane|treatises on advanced spells.|
|You stopped reading because your head started|to hurt just jooking at it!

159.<left>戦いの日々に疲れた そこのあなた。|<left>宿屋の地下にわきでた: If you are weary from everyday battles.|Please soak in the hot spring water in the|basement of the inn to soothe your tired body.

160.<left>町の中にいる カムシカたちは|<left>アズランの住民が 大切にお: The Azlantelope in the town are carefully|cared for by the residents of Azlan. Please do|not give them treats without permission.

161.<left>この駅は はるか昔の木造建築です。|<left>アズランへ吹く風が: This station is a wooden structure from long|ago. The wind that blows into Azlan draws away|moisture to keep it from decaying over time.

162.<left>風の町アズランへ おいでませ。|<left>心地よい そよ風に吹かれ: Welcome to Wind Town Azlan.|Please relax and enjoy the pleasant breeze.

163.<center>魔瘴注意！|<left>都の北には 呪われた大地があり|<lef: Miasma Warning!|To the north of the city lies the Cursed Land,|which is always covered with miasma.

164.<center>木製の武器や 家具を作ってみませんか？|<center>木工ギル: Want to make wooden weapons or furniture?|The Woodworkers' Guild welcomes all newcomers!|～ Woodworkers Guild Headquarters

165.<left>おいでませ 王都カミハルムイへ。|<left>ここは 散ることをしら: Welcome to Royal City Kamiharmui.|This is a city of everlasting spring, decorated|with cherry blossoms that never fall.

166.<left>旅の記念に お茶を たしなみませんか？|<left>茶の心は エルフ: Want a cup of tea to commemorate your journey?|The heart of tea is the heart of an elf.|～ Tea Ceremony Federation

167.<center>忘れ物リスト|<left>雨ガサ ８本 みやびな茶碗 １個|<l: Lost and Found List|8 umbrellas, 1 elegant teacup,|1 copy of "Always Pass New Trials" book.
